name: Hand Fishing HD
description:
Hand-Fishing license Game

Easy Fishing Game (*) and Friendly Screensaver on Working table (**): 2 in 1 !
Designed for both Ipad and iPhone. Best on iPad on Screen-Saver Mode with scenery natural when you are working.
Best on IPhone for playing Fish-Game when you have a free time.

Easy playing on game, friendly screen on Screen-Saver mode. In game mode, there are 3 levels: Mini fish, small fish and Large fish.
Player must had 50 fish before run Next level. Use multi finger-tape and moving to get more Mini-Fish in Fist level.

After 1 minute (default), application change to Screen-Saver mode. It's can be change to 2,3 or 5 minute on Setting. Black-Screen in screen-saver mode can be set ON or OFF (nothing change).
